name: Isaiah Villaolivo
title: Budtender
coverLetter:
My name is Isaiah and I’m a freshman at Pasadena City College, planning on major in communications and liberal arts.

I realized you are looking for a self-starter with the ability to multitask while staying organized and being efficient. I’m highly interested in this opportunity.

I am enthusiastic, reliable and willing to learn. My last year in high school I was part of the water polo team and I regularly take part in the community service and charity events with different kinds of people. I learned how to collaborate with others and work effectively in a team in order to accomplish a common goal. 

An organized, detail oriented, and conscientious self-starter, able to strategize and prioritize effectively to accomplish multiple tasks and stay calm under pressure. 

I have enclosed my resume and can supply references. Thank you for taking the time to review my application and consider me as a candidate. I look forward to hearing from you soon and the opportunity to discuss how I can contribute to your team.
experience:
THE STOCKING FRAME – Los Angeles, California, May 2017- Present 
Food Runner/Busser
•	Maintained high standards of customer service during high-volume, fast-paced operations.
•	Communicated clearly and positively with coworkers and management
•	Built loyal clientele through friendly interactions and consistent appreciation
•	Cross-trained and coordinated scheduling with team members to ensure seamless service
•	Maintained sanitation, health, and safety standards in work areas
•	Knowledge of all the ingredient details of every dish in the menu
•	Delivered food to guest quickly and efficiently
•	Built and maintained relationships with regular customers by learning and remembering preferences
